sense.name: Reproduce the behavior or action of, so as to appear like.
sense.examples: The mime imitated my sister. Children often imitate their older siblings. Advertising agencies cannot imitate the voices of well-known performers. Certain fish imitate the behavior of poisonous species. I like to imitate Kafka's style.

sense.name: Make a physical reproduction of or a close physical representation of something concrete.
sense.examples: The forger imitated a major painting. The author imitates Kafka's passages word for word.
